thread.title: Cosy little family hotel
thread.title_full: Cosy little family hotel - Review of Alhambra Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: _peterroeslerg
title: Cosy little family hotel
text: We enjoyed a very pleasant stay in a clean room with a comfortable bed in this family run small hotel situated right in the heart of London - just round the corner from one of the exits of King's Cross St Pancrass Station in a fairly quiet side street. The British Library is only a few steps away. Delicious English or continental breakfast is included in the price. The staff was very attentive, friendly and helpfull. On top of that, the price was excellent. We shall certainly choose it again next time.
